mapper.insert: INSERT INTO intern_score(teacher_id, intern_id, total, semester , school_year, admin_id, assess_rule_id, assess_detail, assess_format) VALUE (#{data.teacherId}, #{data.internId}, #{data.total}, #{data.semester} , #{data.schoolYear}, #{data.adminId}, #{data.assessRuleId}, #{data.assessDetail} , #{data.assessFormat}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE assess_detail = VALUES(assess_detail) , assess_format = VALUES(assess_format) , total = VALUES(total) , is_deleted = 0
